title: dodging promos
body: gotta love when the client crashes while you're in lobby and counts as a dodge so you get a loss, bad enough riot made me go from bronze 3 to bronze 5 even when  i was getting matched up against golds and plats....

replies.body:
Sometimes client crashes occur, and stuff like this happens. 

As for the ranked reset, it was always going to happen eventually. Your soloq rank is B3 with a win rate of 49%. Even after winning all 10 placements, people almost always end up a couple of ranks lower when they ended. 

Riot messed up with the flex queue match making, something they actually admitted. This resulted in players from any elo, getting matched with each other in pretty much RNG. The fact you were playing against higher ranked players during this time, doesn't actually mean your MMR is up there. 

What's good though, is getting a taste for what it is like to play at that level, getting the confidence and knowing that you can preform or at least hold your own. It means you can set that goal, and start working on getting there.
